description: End-to-end verification of new feature set including tests and UI functionality
context: Tests failing due to TypeScript compilation issues with rbac.ts module augmentation. Proceeding to start stack for manual testing.
Claims AI engine is now running successfully on port 8000 after fixing the FastAPI dependency issues.
